casebody.data:
Dozier vs. Owen et al.; Sawyer vs. Sawyer et al.; Wimberly vs. Wimberly et al.; Morris vs. Tinker et al.; White et al. vs. The Nacoochee Gold Min. Co.; McCall vs. Guilmartin & Co.; Cubbedge, Hazelhurst & Co. vs. Walton, Whann & Co.

The discretion of the chancellor will no.t be controlled in the grant or *158refusal of an injunction, or in the appointment or refusal to appoint a receiver, unless some well-settled principle of law or equity be violated!
